description: The brands have evolved with the times, and are now living and breathing examples of purpose, passion and ambition. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Wearing it loud and proud: Singapore brands making a splash overseas
title_page: Wearing it loud and proud: Singapore brands making a splash overseas | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - Local leather craft studio Bynd Artisan is making the most of the post-Covid-19 surge in consumer demand to conquer new markets here and overseas.
In October, the brand – which makes customised leather and paper gifts – launched its first dedicated overseas Web store, ByndArtisan.com.au, for the Australian market.
